strategy: Baran Siegemaster armies have a Strategy Rating of 2.
Initiative: All formations have a Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Baran Siegemasters

sections.name: Core Company Formations
sections.description: One Siegemaster Regimental HQ must be taken. Each Core Company formation must take between one and three upgrades. Each upgrade may be taken only once.

formations.name: 1 Siegemaster Regimental HQ
formations.units: One Baran Siegemaster with a Commissar, nine Siege Infantry
extraUnits: 40cm of Razor Wire and 4cm of Trenches for each unit of INF in the formation: 50 points. Replace 24cm of Trenches with two Bunkers: 25 points
Five Siege Infantry, or two Snipers, or two Sappers, or two Ogryns: 50 points
Four Rapiers, or three Mole Launcher Squads, or three Thudd Guns, or two Medusa Guns with two Gun Emplacements, or one Deathstrike: 75 points
One Defense Laser, or two Malcadors, or two Malcador Defenders: 150 points

formations.name: Siege Infantry Company
formations.units: One Baran Commander with a Commissar, nine Siege Infantry
extraUnits: 40cm of Razor Wire and 4cm of Trenches for each unit of INF in the formation: 50 points. Replace 24cm of Trenches with two Bunkers: 25 points
Five Siege Infantry, or two Snipers, or two Sappers, or two Ogryns: 50 points
Four Rapiers, or three Mole Launcher Squads, or three Thudd Guns, or two Medusa Guns with two Gun Emplacements, or one Deathstrike: 75 points
One Defense Laser, or two Malcadors, or two Malcador Defenders: 150 points

sections.name: Baran Support Formations
sections.description: Up to two Support Formations for each Core Company.

formations.name: Heavy Tank Company
formations.units: One Commissar, six Ragnarok Heavy Tanks
extraUnits: Add three Ragnarok Heavy Tanks: 125 points

formations.name: Macharius Company
formations.units: One Macharius Command with a Commissar, two Macharius
extraUnits: Add up to three Hellhounds, Bane Wolves, or Devil Dogs: 25 points each

formations.name: Sapper Company
formations.units: One Commissar, eight Sappers, one Hades Breaching Drill

formations.name: Siege Artillery Emplacement
formations.units: Four Medusa Guns and four Gun Emplacements
extraUnits: Replace four Medusa Guns and four Gun Emplacements with three Bombards and three Gun Emplacements: 25 points

formations.name: Howitzer Emplacement
extraUnits: Add three Howitzers and three Gun Emplacements (100 points), or add a Commissar, six Howitzers, and six Gun Emplacements (200 points)
Add one Heavy AA Gun and one Gun Emplacement: 50 points

formations.name: Flak Emplacement
formations.units: Three Heavy AA Guns, three Gun Emplacements

formations.name: Light Artillery Emplacement
formations.units: Four Rapiers, four Thudd Guns, or four Mole Launchers, with 16cm Trenches
extraUnits: Add four units of the same type, 16cm Trenches, and a Commissar: 125 points

formations.name: Griffon Battery
extraUnits: Add up to three Hellhounds, Bane Wolves, or Devil Dogs: 25 points each

formations.name: Death Riders
extraUnits: Add six Death Riders and a Commissar: 100 points
Add up to three Hellhounds, Bane Wolves, or Devil Dogs: 25 points each

formations.name: Siege Recon Squadron
extraUnits: Add up to three Hellhounds, Bane Wolves, or Devil Dogs: 25 points each

sections.name: Imperial Navy
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on Imperial Navy formations

formations.name: 0â€“1 Orbital Support
extraUnits: Replace with an Emperor Class Battleship: 50 points
